conbody.p: Each gathered log file is paired with an XML-based metadata file of the same name. The metadata file contains information about the source of the log data and its current status. The metadata file is created when the log file is fully transferred into the Collector (that is, when the .pmd file is created). The extension of a log file changes as it moves through the system, but its corresponding metadata file keep its .meta extension throughout.
For more information about log file names and extensions, see .
